objective: Find the treasure at the deepest point of the ocean!
demo-explanation: There’s a treasure in the deepest part of the seabed.
Drop probes from your ship in different places to find it.
Neural networks learn by using a similar strategy.
They follow their previous attempts, getting closer and closer to the best solution.

info.title: What does this have to do with AI?
paragraphs: Were you able to find the treasure at the deepest point of the seabed in just a few attempts? How does information from failed attempts help you find the deepest point?
Even if the treasure is rarely found at the first attempt with the probe, the sloped terrain leads you to the treasure relatively quickly.
During training, neural networks use a similar trick by observing how well they are performing their tasks. This allows them to optimise their performance with each round.
